text: Ri Jesús xubꞌij: Man tajin ta kinbꞌij chawe chi xa wuqubꞌ mul xane wuqubꞌ mul oxkꞌal lajuj.18:22 Ri ajilabꞌal 7 chikiwach ri aꞌj Israel kukꞌutwachij jun jastaq ri tzꞌaqat, rumal riꞌ ri Jesús are kubꞌij 7 mul 70. Man kꞌo ta jun kakwinik karajilaj janipa mul kasach jun rukꞌ jun chik xuqujeꞌ janipa mul rajawaxik kakuyunik.
